Title: Illuminated Incipit and Chapter Heading
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.554 is an illuminated incipit page with a chapter heading for chapter 1 (Surat al-fatihah). The final verse is followed by a design of zigzag motifs and stylized leaves in gold ink.
Keywords: Abbasid; Arabic; Binding; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Islamic; Koran; Manuscript; Qur`an; Central Arab Lands (Near East); Kufic; Early Abbasid script
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
